column2: The visitor has the custom of visiting the inhabitants of a captured town in their homes, calming them and assuring them they have nothing to fear, and then promptly cutting their throats
Dandelion is a poet, minstrel, bard and the closest friend of the witcher Geralt of Rivia

Filavandrel aén Fidháil of the Silver Tower was the ruler of the elves of Dol Blathanna. He was a proud king, who had hard time bowing his head even when his subjects (including Toruviel) were facing death by famine.
